    Code.Parents()

    Helping people support children
    starting to explore coding.

    My Caption

    ** This site is in the process of migrated to a new platform
    and may not always look as nice as we’d hope. ***

    Welcome

    Code.Parents() is for people with little or no prior computing experience, who would like to be better prepared to encourage and support children in starting to explore coding.
    We recommend getting started on one of the sections below.

    Why Code?

    I don’t think everyone should become a software developer. But I do think that everyone should have the opportunity to explore coding, ideally from an early age

    Why Code?

    Getting Started

    Let’s explore some great resources to help you get started.

    Getting Started

    What can we do with a Raspberry Pi?

    The Raspberry Pi is an amazing device for making computing and coding more accessible.

    The Raspberry Pi
